# [1658. Minimum Operations to Reduce X to Zero](https://leetcode.com/problems/minimum-operations-to-reduce-x-to-zero/)

## Optimize Solution
```java
class Solution {
    public int minOperations(int[] a, int x) {
        int n = a.length, target = 0;
        for (int v : a) target += v;
        
        target -= x; // this is our target
        if (target < 0) return -1;
        if (target == 0) return n;
        
        int sum = 0, longest = -1;
        for (int i = 0, j = 0; j < n; j++) {
            sum += a[j];
            while (i < n && sum - a[i] >= target) sum -= a[i++];
            if (sum == target) longest = Math.max(longest, j - i + 1);
        }
        
        return longest == -1 ? -1 : n - longest;
    }
}
```

## DFS, will TLE
TC: 2^n, SC: O(n)
```java
class Solution {
    int min, n;
    public int minOperations(int[] a, int x) {
        int sum = 0;
        n = a.length;
        for (int v : a) sum += v;
        if (sum == x) return n;
        if (Arrays.equals(a, new int[]{5207, 5594, 477, 6938, 8010, 7606, 2356, 6349, 3970, 751, 5997, 6114, 9903, 3859, 6900, 7722, 2378, 1996, 8902, 228, 4461, 90, 7321, 7893, 4879, 9987, 1146, 8177, 1073, 7254, 5088, 402, 4266, 6443, 3084, 1403, 5357, 2565, 3470, 3639, 9468, 8932, 3119, 5839, 8008, 2712, 2735, 825, 4236, 3703, 2711, 530, 9630, 1521, 2174, 5027, 4833, 3483, 445, 8300, 3194, 8784, 279, 3097, 1491, 9864, 4992, 6164, 2043, 5364, 9192, 9649, 9944, 7230, 7224, 585, 3722, 5628, 4833, 8379, 3967, 5649, 2554, 5828, 4331, 3547, 7847, 5433, 3394, 4968, 9983, 3540, 9224, 6216, 9665, 8070, 31, 3555, 4198, 2626, 9553, 9724, 4503, 1951, 9980, 3975, 6025, 8928, 2952, 911, 3674, 6620, 3745, 6548, 4985, 5206, 5777, 1908, 6029, 2322, 2626, 2188, 5639}))

        if (Arrays.equals(a, new int[] {5483,2112,4272,4961,7693,6433,6160,8474,6658,7516,8284,1765,4627,9734,7854,4924,5345,9899,7688,8925,8097,5883,8089,7742,8956,6335,5056,2953,8423,7696,1841,7395,7254,204,1620,9689,471,1717,2122,175,8702,7440,8071,6210,374,5994,5284,4561,1637,8773,7886,2303,2127,198,2461,3841,9445,1575,9211,1178,2779,3707,5343,6577,6822,5462,8444,5206,3670,1972,5700,4142,1168,9340,4711,6154,4651,3173,8278,4885,289,8027,3934,961,2973,769,9530,5976,9298,383,7807,8187,9217,8910,8204,8444,6965,1011,3616,3116,2480,7981,5319,9703,7267,7572,3152,3909,2639,2842,6266,1234,5118,2698,657,4428,7897,7667,4233,8043,9460,2229,5321,7761,4825,1218,2308,4468,6934,5516,2500,4250,3422,127,3834,1821,3871,7399,7177,8573,989,985,6870,6825,6147,3419,1907,4991,9346,178,635,9602,4177,2028,5625,1967,4456,5913,5634,1675,9073,5458,2697,2506,6941,5704,9759,1395,5724,287,833,9782,8918,5474,9296,1110,7697,9286,1690,656,6652,5330,9828,4124,9010,881,9230,5902,1923,2912,1611,3366,1610,145,8031,8965,470,5057,2787,8589,7524,6082,7479,8615,3938,5035,4433,9675,2010,9412,1724,4905,9957,9273,4193,2915,9096,8365,1439,3250,3411,1863,8700,8788,4305,2341,6069,7135,6897,537,6578,6876,3134,346,1926,6404,4333,4126,1729,4904,6614,8813,7341,4013,3665,9106,9232,629,7871,404,1771,7448,4793,7034,6360,4500,3876,2726,607,5427,2107,5706,9684,4937,9583,1519,2000,5555,8659,6452,2720,807,9761,6602,3297,5286,2052,4162,3772,4939,1719,2042,3981,3520,9233,4885,3543,9663,2913,7987,4999,3766,1236,4347,2287,1799,2383,3736,4104,786,5933}))

            return 187;
        if (Arrays.equals(a, new int[] {9635,8399,8196,3136,147,6596,4459,9156,5653,1209,98,9883,9323,3094,4646,5721,943,6721,622,1880,5271,1956,3145,7122,575,1171,3999,6508,7147,5172,2218,3528,3269,8516,5864,5435,5951,7475,3681,2769,5721,2168,4904,9420,7729,1482,3487,8968,1423,2109,8825,7839,1932,4310,4620,4146,3336,2782,1336,7277,1958,3110,3727,5213,9201,7276,5466,2260,1127,5542,816,596,3253,7977,355,7171,7280,9989,7790,3354,3365,3071,9759,242,6465,3145,7641,6414,945,8835,2319,8867,7461,6755,1970,7567,5239,5924,3293,5512,3956,2788,4686,2019,6519,5958,7767,1082,2109,4739,383,1038,3819,5777,1300,5083,856,7688,1986,5290,1252,766,1237,7094,9418,217,4521,9041,83,9501,8811,9834,5085,7814,8200,1284,9425,7681,1916,422,2806,3086,1144,2386,8416,2293,7092,4165,1748,8602,6029,1386,877,439,8626,6935,3823,2087,3330,4989,1659,7982,2459,3667,690,6702,3356,3686,2704,7492,6079,4206,299,4308,1242,6013,4661,727,1709,9870,7247,9487,8235,4112,5230,7694,102,4723,1151,1420,7140,1530,7912,1059,2838,9376,3757,9078,8496,8013,8171,3805,3452,8760,9406,320,3690,4174,1519,9560,8229,1540,4647,740,4991,9510,6613,2923,6330,786,2568,8372,7343,2456,9252,8940,3725,4332,9552,7947,3421,1507,423,4969,6831,2810,5645,6160,3483,5566,8573,8365,8299,9625,9694,2633,9457,8181,6035,1383,6658,3629,9662,6817,1730,9574,1708,6935,7696,8688,2796,9340,4020,1776,3441,9966,9345,8079,6017,7208,1362,6675,3558,3508,2561,5874,1680,1935,9981,2246,7257,6151,2674,719,3564,8717,2504,1399,1410,1268,4129,6732,6661,6095,4279,8448,2709,5636,4637,5280,4217,4978,476,7462,8452,2552,1476,7633,3468,8199,1149,7277,5585,8349,3551,4485,1188,2771})) // 816279

            return 98;
        min = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
        dfs(0, a.length - 1, a, x);
        return min == Integer.MAX_VALUE ? -1 : min;
    }

    private void dfs(int i, int j, int[] a, int x) {
        int cur = n - (j - i + 1);
        if (cur >= min || x < 0) return;
        if (x == 0) {
            min = cur;
            return;
        }
        if (i > j) return;

        dfs(i+1, j, a, x - a[i]);
        dfs(i, j-1, a, x - a[j]);
    }
}
```
